dcterms:creator: Brian Brost
Rishabh Mehrotra
Tristan Jehan
dcterms:description: The Music Streaming Sessions Dataset contains 160 Million user sessions of 10 to 20 consecutively listened songs, with interactions sampled from various contexts, including curated collections and recommendations. It provides a rich amount of negative samples for learning effective session-level representations.
dcterms:title: Music Streaming Sessions Dataset

dcterms:creator: O. Celma
dcterms:description: Lastfm-1K is a dataset used for music recommendation and discovery, primarily sourced from user-generated content before the streaming boom, leading to a low source of negative signals.
dcterms:title: Lastfm-1K
